income_messages:
From: m*********3@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-23 13:13:29
SUBJECT: Dear xxx
Dear xxx
My name is Mrs. Siti Zakiah Binto Sulaiman, a citizen of Malaysia and
wife of late Sulaiman, a sailor who died in 2021.
My husband was a sailor moving crude product from Asia countries
across the world, some of the companies my husband work with include
Saudi Arabian Oil Co, Exxon Mobil Corp, Chevron Corp.
Before my husband demise in 2021, he secretly have large deposit of
$25,000,000.00 he earned from oil business he secretly did, the
$25,000,000 is presently in a secret account in Bank Mandiri, European
branch, Bank Mandiri is one of Malaysia largest bank. This funds is
only known to me as the signatory to the funds, I cannot receive this
funds in Malaysia due to my tradition and religion. I want you to
receive this funds on my behalf and we both split the funds equally.
When I receive your response, I will send you the contact information
of the Bank Manager in the Bank European branch to communicate with
your directly
Regards
Mrs. Siti Zakiah Binto Sulaiman
From: m*********3@gmail.com
To: km82448@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-24 04:39:00
SUBJECT: Re: Transaction
Dear Mr. Michael
I do really appreciate your response, this funds was rightfully earned
by my late husband and the reason I want you to receive the funds for
investment in your country is due to my religion and tradition which
will not allow me to inherit such huge amount of money non involve in
such investment.
When you receive the funds, you will invite me to your country to
enable me get a visa to your country where I will use my 50% of the
funds to buy a house in your city.
send me your full name and address so that I will write a letter of
authorization to the bank with your information for the payment
process, I will also give you the contact information of the Bank
director who will handle the transfer
Regards
Mrs. Siti Zakiah Binto Sulaiman
From: m*********3@gmail.com
To: km82448@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-24 10:05:00
SUBJECT: Re: Transaction
Dear Michael
The total amount available for transfer is $25,000,000.00 with Bank
Mandiri, the attached Proof of funds letter contain some details of
the funds, I have communicated with the Director of Corporate Director
of Bank Mandiri in Europe and she requested that you communicate
directly with her to prepare arrangement for transfer
You can reach the director through her contact information below
Alexandra Askandar
Director of Corporate Banking
Jl Jend. Gatot Surbroto
Kav. 36 Jarkata 12190 Indonesia
Europe address: 23 Thomas More St, London
E1W 1YW, United Kingdom
+44 703-191-2620
corporatedirector@bankmandiri.eu
remittancebm@skiff.com
Regards
Mrs. Siti Zakiah Binto Sulaiman
outbound_messages:
From: km82448@l******s.email
To: m*********3@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-23 13:13:35
SUBJECT: Re: Dear xxx
Dear Mrs. Siti Zakiah Binto Sulaiman,
Thank you for your email. While I appreciate your offer, I must decline as I do not feel comfortable with such a proposal. I hope you are able to find a trustworthy person to assist you with your funds.
Best wishes,
Michael
From: km82448@l******s.email
To: m*********3@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-24 13:13:46
SUBJECT: Re: Transaction
Dear Mrs. Siti Zakiah Binto Sulaiman,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the funds available for transfer. I will contact Alexandra Askandar, the Director of Corporate Banking at Bank Mandiri, to discuss the transfer process and prepare for the transfer.
Thank you again for your assistance.
Best wishes,
Michael
